Method Detail

onStrategyStart

void onStrategyStart()
Called once per instrument at strategy start.

onStrategyStop

void onStrategyStop()
Called once per instrument after last bar on strategy stop.

onOpen

void onOpen(OpenPrice openPrice)
Called once per bar per instrument at beginning of a bar. When run on multiple instruments, open and close are sent in their actual order, based on UTC time of events. For instance:
  • open CAC_40
  • open FTSE
  • close CAC_40
  • close FTSE
Please note that when run on multiple instruments, each bar is sent only to its strategy instance (there is one strategy instance per instrument).

When buying or selling, the price of the instrument is the close price.

Parameters:
openPrice - price and date of the opening

onPositionOpened

@Deprecated
void onPositionOpened(long newPosition)
Deprecated. 

Alias onPositionOpened(Position)

onPositionOpened

void onPositionOpened(Position newPosition)
Called whenever the position on the current instrument has been opened. That is, when position has changed, and was flat previously.
Note that the onPositionChanged(long, long) callback is invoked every time this method is invoked.

onPositionChanged

void onPositionChanged(Position previousPosition,
                       Position newPosition)
Called whenever the position has changed. That is, when the volume of the position has changed from any value to another, different value.
Note that this method is always called on a change, including when that change also caused the position to open or close.

onPositionClosed

void onPositionClosed(Position previousPosition)
Called whenever the position has been closed. That is when position has changed, and is now flat.
Note that the onPositionChanged(long, long) callback is invoked every time this method is invoked.

onPositionOpened

@Deprecated
void onPositionOpened()
Deprecated.

onPositionClosed

@Deprecated
void onPositionClosed()
Deprecated. 

Alias of onPositionClosed(Position).

onClose

void onClose(Bar bar)
Called once per bar per instrument. When run on multiple instruments, open and close are sent in real order, based on UTC time of events. For instance:
  • open CAC_40
  • open FTSE
  • close CAC_40
  • close FTSE
Please note that when run on multiple instruments, each bar is sent only to its instance (there is one strategy instance per instrument).

Parameters:
bar - is the current bar, containing market data like open price, close price, high, low, and volume

onPortfolioReset

void onPortfolioReset()
Called only in the case of specific events leading to completely new values in the portfolio (different positions and potentially also different orders remaining in the market). This happens typically at the end of a bootstrap phase when a strategy goes live, all previous orders and positions are reset.
